Articles.Content:
I love the look of the Kerbin Shuttle Orbiter. However I don't like how the shuttles are not modular, but there is only one way you can build the shuttle, no creativity.

Would someone please make a KSOS looking cockpit for MK3 fuselage

If you wanted and had some of the kso installed you might try change MK3 to the kso if you can link the kso cockpit ?

EDIT- You could edit the MK3 cfg to this

INTERNAL

{

name = internalkso

}

Edited December 29, 2014 by Mecripp2

What?

I want a cockpit from the image below, that I can strap on my MK3 shuttle, instead of the hideous new stock MK3 cockpit.
sorry miss read that you might try checking this thread http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97525-0-90-WIP-DEV-OPTSpace-Plane-Parts-V1-4-9-Mk3-Space-Shuttle-Expansions he as 2 mods started.

What?

I want a cockpit from the image below, that I can strap on my MK3 shuttle, instead of the hideous new stock MK3 cockpit.

http://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/795186902511623651/EF463DD6B415FEA79774CF36A25EF248163776BB/

hideous? I understand beauty is in the eye of the beholder and all but aside from the lack of an IVA I wouldn't consider the new stock mk3 cockpit hideous (far from it in fact and that's without comparing it to its precursor). Also the KSO's smooth plastic/enamel painted look might clash with the stock areo parts paneled look but again beauty is in the eye of the beholder.

What you could do is model a cockpit that fits the mk3 format and then Map its UV's to the KSO cockpits texture to capture as much of the look as possible. There is a growing number of modding tutorials and other forms of modding help so it could be possible to pull off given enough time and effort.
